description: Vivo V60 is expected to be nearing its release as it has been spotted on the Malaysian SIRIM certification website and the TUV website. It appeared with model number V2511. The TUV listing suggests 90W fast charging support on the phone.  It is speculated to debut as a modified version of the Vivo S30.
title: Vivo V60 Reportedly Listed on SIRIM and TUV Websites, Could Launch Soon

description: During Amazon's Prime Day 2025 sale, which will last from July 12 to July 14, several iQOO smartphones will be available at discounted prices. The flagship iQOO 13 can be bought at Rs. 52,999 for the base 12GB + 256GB option. The iQOO Neo 10 and Neo 10R will start at Rs. 26,999 and Rs. 23,499, respectively, for their 8GB + 128GB variants. All prices include bank offers and other coupon discounts.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: iQOO 13, iQOO Neo 10R, iQOO Z10x and More to Go on Sale at Discounted Prices

description: Apple Maps might get an upgraded natural language search feature with the iOS 26 update, according to a report. The report found the feature in the code strings within the Maps app. The new search feature could reportedly allow users to initiate descriptive searches of a particular place they would like to visit.
title: Apple Maps in iOS 26 Beta Version Come With An Upgraded Search Feature: Report

description: Swiggy Instamart announced on Tuesday that it has partnered with Reliance Jio to offer 10-minute delivery of Jio mobile phones across 95 cities in India. As part of the tie-up, customers can now order the JioBharat V4 and JioPhone Prima 2 directly via the quick-commerce platform.
title: Swiggy Instamart Teams Up With Jio for Instant Delivery of JioBharat V4 and JioPhone Prima 2

description: The Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 Pro will be available for an effective price of Rs. 10,999 during the Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale with bank offers and discounts, down from the Rs. 19,999 launch price. Available in Silver and White shades, they feature 10.5mm dynamic drivers with 6.1mm Planar units, and AI-backed adaptive ANC, including Ambient and Siren Detect modes. They are claimed to offer up to 30 hours of playback without ANC. The earbuds have an IP57 rating and weigh 5.4g each.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 Pro to Be Available at a Discounted Price

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale is confirmed to be held between July 12-14. The e-commerce giant’s annual sale for its Prime subscribers is going to be held for three days in India, marking a first. During the sale, users can find a wide range of discounts on smartphones, laptops, earphones, smartwatches, smart TVs, washing machines, air conditioners, and more.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Top Smart TV Deals Revealed Ahead of the Sale

description: Microsoft Edge has reached a “major milestone” with regards to the responsiveness and quick loading time of the web browser’s user interface, the company announced on Monday. The Redmond-based tech giant said its cumulative efforts have been underway since February 2025 and have helped it improve the loading speed of initial content, a key factor which “significantly” impacts user satisfaction. Consequently, users can now take advantage of a smoother web browsing experience with minimal delays.
title: Microsoft Edge Can Now Load Websites Faster After Migration to WebUI 2.0, Says Company

description: The OnePlus Nord CE 5 has been launched with a more powerful processor and a significantly larger battery than its predecessor, the OnePlus Nord CE 4. It also features new OnePlus AI software. The new Nord CE 5 will compete with the iQOO Z10, Motorola Edge 60 Fusion, Infinix GT 30 Pro, and Vivo T4. Read on to find out if it has what it takes to beat similarly priced rivals.
title: OnePlus Nord CE 5 Review: Nice Upgrades, Nicer Price

description: Oppo Reno 14 has been launched in a new Sun and Moonlight colour option in China. This new variant has a two-way temperature-sensitive rear panel that lets it change its colour. It shows Sunlight Orange shade or Moonlight Silver shade in different temperature conditions. The Reno 14 is equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset.
title: Oppo Reno 14 Launched in New Finish With Temperature-Sensitive Colour Changing Rear Panel

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale is the e-commerce giant’s annual sale geared towards the platform’s subscribers. This year, it is confirmed to be held between July 12 and 14 (Saturday to Monday). The three-day sale will witness big discounts on a large variety of products, new launches, and more. The home appliance category, in particular, gets lucrative discounts and other offers.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Check the Best Home Appliance Deals You Can Get

description: Nothing Phone 3 has just been launched as the brand's new premium flagship. The Phone 3 is the spiritual successor to the Phone 2, but Nothing aims to take on phones from big brands with the new phone. We compare it with a worthy long-standing competitor from the premium smartphone segment, the Samsung Galaxy S25.
title: Nothing Phone 3 vs Samsung Galaxy S25: Price in India, Features Specifications Compared

description: Ahead of its expected launch on July 9, the Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Classic has been spotted with Gemini voice assistant. The promo image, shared by WinFuture’s Roland Quandt on Bluesky, shows a Galaxy Watch 8 Classic with “Ask Google Gemini” on the display. Google is reportedly bringing AI assistant to WearOS, and hence, could be available for the entire Galaxy Watch 8 Series.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Series Could Launch With Gemini Voice Assistant

description: WhatsApp is rolling out an AI-powered feature that lets users generate custom chat wallpapers. After updating to the latest stable version of WhatsApp for iOS, users can create backgrounds with prompts and fine-tune them. WhatsApp will also make it easier to view replies to messages in the form of structured threads, in the future. Here's everything you need to know about how the feature works on WhatsApp for
title: WhatsApp Rolls Out AI-Powered Chat Wallpaper Feature; Threaded Message Replies Spotted in Development

description: OpenAI might be testing a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature for ChatGPT. Several netizens shared screenshots of the new feature, dubbed Study Together, on social media platforms on Sunday, leading to the belief that the San Francisco-based AI firm is conducting a test run for it. Based on the experience of users with this feature, it appears to be similar to Google’s LearnLM.
title: ChatGPT Could Soon Get a Study Together Feature That Helps Users Learn New Topics

description: Samsung Galaxy S FE models have always been the gateway device for buyers wanting to get a taste of Samsung’s premium smartphone features. The Galaxy S24 FE did just that with a premium design, a capable processor and cameras, all enhanced by plenty of new AI tricks. However, Samsung wants to add some upgrades this time around and a new report points to the use of a premium-grade display on the Galaxy S25 FE.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE to Sport a 6.7-Inch Flexible OLED Display: Report

description: AiQ Wearbuds was launched by Madhav Sheth’s AI+ brand at an event held in New Delhi on Tuesday. The smartwatch is advertised as a two-in-one ecosystem product and comes with built-in true-wireless-stereo (TWS) earbuds. It sports a 1.43-inch AMOLED screen and is equipped with heart rate and SpO2 monitoring sensors. Meanwhile, the earbuds carry 6mm dynamic drivers and a playback time of more than three hours.
title: AiQ Wearbuds Smartwatch With Built-In TWS Earbuds, Blood Pressure Monitoring Launched in India

description: During the upcoming Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale, the OnePlus 13 will be available at a significantly discounted price. Besides the general discount, shoppers can avail of bank-based offers and exchange discounts. The OnePlus 13 was launched in January at a starting price tag of Rs. 69,999.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: OnePlus 13 Offer Price Revealed

description: Meta Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg has been on a hiring spree, bringing on major AI leaders including Scale AI’s Alexandr Wang, startup founder Daniel Gross and former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman with high compensation.
title: Apple Loses Top AI Models Executive to Meta’s Hiring Spree

description: The OnePlus Buds 4 are priced at Rs. 5,999 in India and will go on sale on July 12. They come with 11mm woofers, 6mm tweeters, Hi-Res Wireless Audio certification, and LHDC 5.0 codec support. The TWS earphones offer up to 55dB adaptive ANC, AI call noise reduction, Bluetooth 5.4 and dual-device connectivity as well as a 47ms low-latency Gaming Mode. They offer up to 45 hours of total playback with the included charging case.
title: OnePlus Buds 4 Launched in India With Adaptive ANC, Up to 45 Hours of Total Battery Life: Price, Features

description: OnePlus Nord 5 and OnePlus Nord CE 5 have been launched in India. Both new smartphones run on Android 15 and include AI features that first arrived on the OnePlus 13s. The OnePlus Nord 5 features the new programmable Plus Key, which replaces the alert slider. Both models come with a 50-megapixel rear camera, a colour-coordinated TPU cover, and an 80W charger in the box.
title: OnePlus Nord 5, Nord CE 5 Launched in India With 50-Megapixel Rear Camera, OnePlus AI Features

description: The OnePlus Nord 5 offers notable upgrades from its predecessor, including a more powerful Snapdragon 8 series chipset and enhanced camera capabilities. However, it faces intense competition in the midrange segment, particularly around the Rs. 30,000 price point. Read our OnePlus Nord 5 review to see how it competes with rivals like the Poco F7, Motorola Edge 60 Pro, iQOO Neo 10R, and the Nothing Phone 3a Pro.
title: OnePlus Nord 5 Review: Nord Just Another Midrange Phone

description: AI+ Pulse and AI+ Nova 5G smartphones were launched in India on Tuesday. The handsets are the first to run on NxtQuantum OS, which is said to store user data in MeitY-approved (Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology) Google Cloud servers. The company claims that the operating system was entirely built in India and is based on Android 15.
title: AI+ Pulse and Nova 5G Smartphones Launched in India With 50-Megapixel Rear Cameras

description: Apple took a challenge against EU regulators to Europe's second highest court on Monday after they fined it 500 million euros ($587 million) earlier this year for breaching landmark rules aimed at curbing the power of Big Tech.
title: Apple Takes Fight Against $587 Million EU Antitrust Fine to Court

description: Nothing sub-brand CMF is relocating its global marketing operations to India. The company is actively hiring for various marketing roles, including project and PR managers, and social media producers, in Gurgaon. Nothing and CMF products are already being assembled in the country, and the company's co-founder said India is CMF's "most important market".
title: CMF by Nothing Shifts Global Marketing Operations to India, New Jobs Listed on Company's Website

description: Nothing’s CMF launched the Watch Pro 2 in India with a 1.32-inch AMOLED touchscreen and interchangeable bezels in July 2024. Now, the budget brand is reportedly planning to unveil the Watch Pro 3 with a price tag of EUR 99 (roughly Rs. 9,963.27). However, the company has not confirmed the price details or announced a launch date.
title: CMF Watch Pro 3 Expected to Launch Soon; Price Leaked Online

description: Google announced the rollout of AI Mode in Search to all users in India on Tuesday. The artificial intelligence (AI) search functionality was so far only available to Indian users registered on Search Labs, but now it is being provided to everyone. The Mountain View-based tech giant has made the feature available across the desktop interface and via the Google app for Android and iOS.
title: Google Rolls Out AI Mode in Search to All Users in India, Removes Search Labs Sign Up Requirement

description: Honor X70 will be launched in China on July 15 and is currently up for pre-order in China. It will come with an 8,300mAh battery with support for 80W wired fast charging. The new phone is expected to offer upgrades over Honor X60. The existing model offers a 5,800mAh battery with 35W charging support.
title: Honor X70 Confirmed to Launch on July 15; Battery, Charging Details Revealed

description: Samsung is upgrading its on-device and cross-device security in Galaxy devices running One UI 8 to better protect user data and the artificial intelligence (AI) apps that contain sensitive data, such as user preferences and routines. The company is also looking towards the future and improving its Secure Wi-Fi to ensure quantum hacking attempts can be curbed.
title: Samsung Introduces New Security Features in One UI 8 to Protect On-Device AI Tools and Future-Proof Devices

description: Call of Duty: WWII reportedly has an exploit on the Xbox PC app that allows malicious actors to hack into players' PCs. Activision has acknowledged the issue and has taken the game offline while it investigates the problem.
title: Call of Duty: WWII on Xbox PC App Taken Offline After Players Report Security Issue

description: Canva, the visual communications platform, suffered an outage on Tuesday morning, as per user reports and outage trackers. The platform became inaccessible for hundreds of users globally, with many claiming to be unable to load their existing projects or start a new project. Others complained of not being able to edit their photos and other assets.
title: Canva Down: Users Unable to Edit Photos and Load Projects as Platform Suffers Outage

description: Google's Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold models could go official next month. A new leak has now suggested the colourways and storage details of the phones. The Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, and Pixel 10 Pro XL are said to start at 128GB, while the Pixel 10 Pro Fold could start at 256GB. The Pixel 10 Pro Fold could come in two colourways.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series Colour Options, Storage Configurations Surface Online

description: Jack Dorsey on Monday announced a new decentralised messaging app called Bitchat. It is a peer-to-peer public domain messaging project which operates over Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) mesh networks. Bitchat is said to offer a more secure method of messaging, protected with end-to-end encryption. The app does not require internet, an account, or even a phone number to function, the X (formerly Twitter) co-founder said. Other features include a favourites system, mentions, and rooms for topic-based conversations.
title: Jack Dorsey Announces Bitchat, a Decentralised Messaging App Which Does Not Require Phone Numbers

description: Realme 15 5G and 15 Pro 5G will be unveiled in India on July 24 at 7pm IST, the company revealed in a press release. The Pro variant will come in Flowing Silver, Silk Purple, and Velvet Green colourways. While both models appear to have triple rear cameras, the base model may have a dual setup with a decorative third slot. The phones will feature AI tools like AI Edit Genie and AI Party for enhanced photo editing and real-time camera adjustments.
title: Realme 15 5G Series India Launch Date Set for July 24; Design, Colour Options Revealed

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, and Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE have been listed on a retailer's website, according to a tipster. These listings appear to confirm earlier leaks, indicating the Z Fold 7 will feature a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, while the Z Flip 7 is rumoured to pack an Exynos 2500 processor. Read on to know more about these upcoming handsets.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE Specifications Leaked via Retail Listing

description: Tecno is expected to unveil its Phantom Ultimate G Fold Concept tri-fold smartphone in mid-July, shortly after Samsung's anticipated Galaxy G Fold launch on July 9. Leaked images of the former show both side panels folding inward, unlike Tecno’s previous tri-fold concept. The design features a silver matte frame and a horizontal camera module, resembling the Pixel 9 series. While only a concept, the device highlights Tecno’s innovation efforts.
title: Tecno Phantom Ultimate G Fold Tri-Fold Phone Said to Launch in July; Design Leaked

description: One might think that artificial intelligence (AI) tools like ChatGPT might be difficult to come by. There are reasons to believe so. The GPT and o series AI models that power the chatbot and its various features are some of the most advanced in existence. So, let us check out the top five ChatGPT alternatives in 2025.
title: Top 5 ChatGPT Alternatives in 2025 You Should Try for a Unique Experience

description: Boat announced a partnership with luggage and travel accessories company Safari during a Prime Day 2025 event held in New Delhi on Monday. As part of the ‘Safari x Boat’ collaboration, the Indian smart wearable brand will launch new smart luggage during the Amazon Prime Day sale, which is to be held in the country between July 12 and 14.
title: Boat to Partner With Safari for Launch of Smart Luggage in India During Amazon Prime Day 2025

description: Apple on Monday released iOS 26 Beta 3 for iPhone. The latest update brings several visual tweaks over the previous iteration that was introduced in June. As per the Cupertino-based tech giant, there are more colour choices for the stock wallpaper for home and lock screens. It is said to have also adjusted the appearance of the new Liquid Glass interface which now has a darker colouration in several apps as compared to the iOS 26 Beta 2 update.
title: iOS 26 Beta 3 Update for iPhone Released With New Stock Wallpapers, Darker Liquid Glass Appearance

description: AI+ is set to launch its Pulse and Nova 5G smartphones today in India, with the event being livestreamed on YouTube. The phones will be available for purchase via Flipkart. Both models are confirmed to pack a 5,000mAh battery and 50-megapixel rear cameras. The Nova 5G is expected to be powered by the Unisoc T8200 chipset.
title: AI+ Nova 5G, Pulse India Launch Today: Know Price, Specifications and More

description: OnePlus Nord 5 series is set to be launched in India later today at the OnePlus Summer Launch Event. The lineup is confirmed to comprise two handsets — the OnePlus Nord 5 and the Nord CE 5. So, with launch on the horizon, here's all you need to know about the OnePlus Nord 5 series including its price, expected features and specifications.
title: OnePlus Nord 5, Nord CE 5 Launch Today: Know Price, Expected Features and Specifications
